Text.Page: You built sand castles with Langon.

Hehe. Glad to see you again, ! I knew you'd be back!

The most fun you can have at the beach is building a sand castle, wouldn't you say?

I know I would! I make sand castles three times a day!

No one makes better sand castles than me. Hehehe!
Super fun, eh? Heheheâ€”the most fun ever!
